definition: EML RoleType value indicating the party is an author
scope_note: Use for authored intellectual content such as literature resources

definition: EML RoleType value indicating the party provided content
scope_note: Use when a party contributed substantive content to the resource
note: {EML RoleType allowed value|ISO mapping chosen as closest concept contributor}

definition: EML RoleType value indicating the party is responsible for stewardship
scope_note: Use for long term care maintenance and stewardship responsibilities
note: {EML RoleType allowed value|ISO mapping from CI_RoleCode custodian}

definition: EML RoleType value indicating the party distributes the resource
scope_note: Use for repositories portals or services that distribute access
note: {EML RoleType allowed value|ISO mapping from CI_RoleCode distributor}

definition: EML RoleType value indicating the party edited the resource
scope_note: Use when a party performed editorial revision work
note: {EML RoleType allowed value|ISO mapping from CI_RoleCode editor}

definition: EML RoleType value indicating the party created the metadata record
scope_note: No direct CI_RoleCode equivalent in CIT 1.0 so close_match_ids left empty
note: {EML RoleType allowed value|ISO CI_RoleCode list does not include metadataProvider}

definition: EML RoleType value indicating the party originated the resource
scope_note: Use for the original creator or generator of the dataset or resource
note: {EML RoleType allowed value|ISO mapping from CI_RoleCode originator}

definition: EML RoleType value indicating the party is the point of contact
scope_note: Use for the primary support or inquiry contact for the resource
note: {EML RoleType allowed value|ISO mapping from CI_RoleCode pointOfContact}

definition: EML RoleType value indicating the party is the principal investigator
scope_note: Use for the lead investigator with scientific responsibility for the project
note: {EML RoleType allowed value|ISO mapping from CI_RoleCode principalInvestigator}

definition: EML RoleType value indicating the party processed or transformed the resource
scope_note: Use for QAQC transformation aggregation or derivation roles
note: {EML RoleType allowed value|ISO mapping from CI_RoleCode processor}

definition: EML RoleType value indicating the party published the resource
scope_note: Use for the entity responsible for publishing or releasing the resource
note: {EML RoleType allowed value|ISO mapping from CI_RoleCode publisher}

definition: EML RoleType value indicating the party is a user of the resource
scope_note: Use sparingly and only when documenting an explicit user role
note: {EML RoleType allowed value|ISO mapping from CI_RoleCode user}
